p: Seven of the transition metals in the periodic table have the bcc structure, see TableÂ 21. Of the magnetic elements Fe, Co, and Ni, only iron is bcc. Nanocubes of iron appear to be the only bcc cluster shape synthesized so far [ 25]. Although the bulk structure of iron is bcc, fcc nanoclusters have been synthesized [ 26]. This reference also analyzes the thermodynamic stability of the clusters. Here we present 5 bcc cluster shapes and their associated magic formulas.
